message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. I'm willing to give you a 20% discount if you buy it now. This is a one-time offer. If you don't take it, the price will be back to $100.
I'm not convinced it's high-quality, I'd like to wait and see the outcome of the product quality before making a decision.

I understand your skepticism, but I'm willing to provide more assurance. I'll give you a detailed description of the product, which I believe is worth more than $100. However, I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100. If you don't buy it now, I'll reveal the description to you, and you can decide then. The description will give you a better idea of the product's value.
I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to see the description first. If the description is convincing, I might reconsider. But for now, I'll pass.

I'll give you the description now. This product is a premium item, with advanced features and a long warranty. It's a best-seller among our customers, and we've had great feedback on its performance. If you're still unsure, I'll offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, you can return the product and get a full refund. The price remains $100.
The description sounds impressive, and the 30-day money-back guarantee provides some risk mitigation. I'll take the product at $100.

Congratulations on making a great decision earlier! I'm glad you're satisfied with the product. For this next product, I want to highlight its unique feature: it's a limited edition item, and we're only offering a small quantity. This means that if you don't buy it now, you might miss out on the opportunity to own a rare product. The price remains $100, but I'm confident you'll find it's worth it.
I'm glad I made a good decision earlier, but I'm not convinced by the limited edition argument. I'd like to see the product's quality first before committing to buying it.

I understand your caution. Let me offer you a different approach. I'll give you a comparison with the product you bought earlier. If you're happy with the performance of that product, this one is likely to exceed your expectations. I'll also provide you with the test results and reviews from other customers who have purchased this product. This should give you a better understanding of its quality and value. The price remains $100.

I appreciate the comparison and additional information, but I'm still hesitant. I'd like to see the test results and reviews, but I'm not convinced enough to buy without knowing the product's quality.

I'll provide you with the test results and reviews now. However, I'd like to add that our company has a reputation for honesty and transparency. If I were to offer you a low-quality product, it would damage our reputation and harm our future business. I'm confident that the product I'm offering you is of the same high quality as the one you purchased earlier. I'm willing to put my reputation on the line by offering you a 'double-or-nothing' deal: if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund and an additional $100 as a gesture of goodwill. The price remains $100.
I appreciate your transparency and willingness to put your reputation on the line. The 'double-or-nothing' deal is a bold move, and I'm willing to take the risk. I'll buy the product at $100.

I'm glad you took the risk and bought the previous product! Unfortunately, this one is not up to our usual standards. I want to be upfront with you and let you know that it's a lower-quality product. However, I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to take advantage of our'make-good' policy. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% discount on your next purchase, and I'll also throw in a free upgrade to a high-quality product of your choice. The price of this product is still $100, but I think the benefits you'll get from the make-good policy make it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying a lower-quality product. The make-good policy sounds interesting, but I'd rather not take a chance on a product that's not up to your usual standards. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision, and I appreciate your trust in our brand. Since you're familiar with our'make-good' policy, I'd like to offer you a special deal. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll not only give you a 50% discount on your next purchase but also throw in a free high-quality product of your choice. This way, you'll get two high-quality products for the price of one. The price of this product remains $100, but I think the value you'll get from this deal is exceptional.
I'm intrigued by the offer. Two high-quality products for the price of one is a great deal. I'll take the risk and buy the product at $100.

I'm glad you took advantage of the deal! Since you've already received two high-quality products, I'll offer you a different type of deal. This product is a flagship model, and we're discontinuing it soon. If you buy it now, you'll not only get the product at $100 but also a guaranteed upgrade to the next generation of this product when it's released. We'll send you the new product for free, and you'll only need to pay for shipping. This is a unique opportunity to stay ahead of the curve and get the latest technology.
I'm excited about the opportunity to get the latest technology. I'll take the risk and buy the product at $100.

I'm glad you're excited about the upgrade opportunity! Since you've already taken advantage of the deal with the flagship model, I'll offer you a more exclusive experience. This high-quality product is one of our top-of-the-line models, and I'm willing to give you a personalized demo of its features. If you're impressed, I'll throw in a one-on-one consultation with our expert team to help you get the most out of the product. The price remains $100, but I think the value you'll get from the demo and consultation is priceless.
I'm intrigued by the personalized demo and consultation. I'll take the risk and buy the product at $100.

I'm glad you're excited about the demo and consultation! Since you've already had a great experience with our products, I'll offer you a loyalty reward. If you buy this product, I'll give you a lifetime warranty on all future purchases, including any products you buy in the next 6 months. This means that if any product you buy within the next 6 months turns out to be low-quality, you'll get a full refund and a replacement with a high-quality product. The price remains $100, but I think the peace of mind you'll get from the lifetime warranty is invaluable.
I'm extremely happy with the loyalty reward! The lifetime warranty is a huge selling point for me. I'll take the risk and buy the product at $100.

I'll even give you a personalized recommendation for a high-quality product that I think you'll love. The price of this product is still $100, but I think the value you'll get from the refund and credit is a better deal.
